meanings.sent1: The suggesters in the meeting proposed new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The suggesters offered helpful advice to improve the project.
meanings.sent3: The suggesters at the party recommended wearing a funny hat.
meanings.sent4: She was a suggester of light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The suggesters were like guiding stars, showing the way forward.

meanings.definition: A tool or system that provides suggestions.
meanings.sent1: The online suggesters helped me find the perfect gift.
meanings.sent2: The suggesters on the app suggested a nearby restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The suggesters on the website had a playful sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The suggesters functioned like a helpful compass, pointing me in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The suggesters were like friendly guides, leading me through the options.
